reviews.review:
-Ran around in the woods as a hooded man with a mask
-Found a person and shanked them 
-Placed them on a meat hook 
-Found and killed the other 3
-Came home and played Dead By Daylight

10/10 really fun game
É um jogo que muitas vezes vai te fazer passar raiva por alguns jogadores tóxicos, pois depende de cooperação para a vitória mas é bastante divertido com amigos!

Very cool game, but it's a little bit pay to win. You have to spend a lot of time to unlock new killers or new survivors, so its much easier to just spends 2$ on a new killer. It's a very fun game tho, you can play custom matches with 4 of your friends. Pretty easy to get good at.
Devs are constantly improving graphics and adding new content. So excited for Ringu chapter!

Fajna gra w Trybie Nastolatków kto by nie chciał być takim nastolatkiem przecież w takich czasach.? (xd)
Dead by Daylight wygląda zupełnie inaczej z perspektywy mordercy. Rozgrywka zamienia się z trzecioosobowej walki o przetrwanie w pierwszoosobowe polowanie. Oprawca zawsze jest nieco szybszy od swoich ofiar, dzięki czemu wcześniej czy później dopada biednych nastolatków. Oczywiście o ile najpierw odnajdzie ich na mapie.
Moja ostateczna opinia to 8,5/10
(bardzo fajna gra zabójcami i wg ale trochu droga więc nie ma się co dziwić nie jest jakoś dożo mega postaci a twórcy muszą z czegoś żyć wiec szacunek).
fun until you leave custom games.
playing killer in this game just inst fun the only times that i even play killer anymore is when im in a custom with my friends
macht sehr viel spaß auch allein ^^
rnm还我血点，我幸幸苦苦搞得血点一个同步失败毛都不剩，rnm6万多血点啊.

Dead by Daylight is a love letter to the horror community as a whole, filled with references to previous horror works and even a few cameos from the survivors or killers! The gameplay is nice and action packed and the music is tense and horrifying.

However, I do not like the matchmaking feature. It can really give newcomers to the game a hard time if paired up with the wrong people. Hope the developers can fix that for more fairer gameplay.

Overall, a fantastic game and one of the rarer online games I can see myself playing often.

This game is very fun! If you end up playing with friends, you will have an even greater time and have endless laughs! I've been playing this game for a while and this is my comfort game! I always come back to this game whenever I can't decide on a game to play. Kind of like "The Office" but for gaming lol! The game is very simple and it never gets old! I 100% recommend it to everyone that loves team games! Although, there is a killer option for Solo, I find it more enjoyable to be the survivor. You will experience a roller coaster of emotions! There are different types of play styles and personalities of the type of people that play this game. It can be toxic at times but what multiplayer game isn't. The fun games outweigh the bad ones. It can take a bit to learn the different survivor or killer build types but once you can dial in your main perks and understand your play style the games become very exciting! This game is best played with friends. Solo queues are hit or miss. But the fun comes mainly from chatting with your friends while you play this game! Happy gaming everyone!!

ich empfehle es aber wenn die killer als nur wie hunde campen können sie auch einfach hide and seek spiele für free runterladen also wie wenig hobbys muss man haben das kann doch keinen spaß machen da zu stehen und zu gucken.

great game! do keep in mine the arguments about his game are one sided cuz it is all about  the killer trying  to kill survivors and survivors want to escape there will never be a balance that will make it great for everyone. you just have to look at the game play and there are great mechanics here. it is well worth the buy!

自分が買う前に知りたかったこのゲームの現状を書いときます。
・とてつもなくアンフェアな非対称ゲーで、いまさらキラー側がやりたい人は買わない方が絶対良い。
・キラー人口が少ないから初心者もすぐ上位のサバイバーとマッチングする。
・パーティーを組んだサバイバーに当たると何も関係なしにほぼ負け。
・ほんとにギャグかと思うぐらいにキラー不利な調整が続く。
・新キラーのパークのためにキラーが追加されるたびに課金しなければならない。
　俺みたいにキラー専でやりたい人は、わざわざ時間とお金を使ってptサバや上手いサバに煽られてマジで買う意味はありません。単純な話、快感と不快感の比率があってません。
　残念だけど俺はキラーしか興味なかったのでもうdbdはもうやめます。じゃあね。
Eu amoooooo. Nunca fui de gostar muito de jogos, mas esse há mais de ano me pegou em cheio, não consigo ficar sem jogar por muito tempo.
Очень позитивная игра, если иметь нервы.)

Macht mega Spaß, man hat zwar manchmal lange Wartezeiten auf Partien, aber ob alleine oder mit mehreren, als Überlebender oder Killer macht das Spiel sehr Spaß. Freue mich auf weitere Updates, neue Maps, neue Killer und neue Überlebende.
O jogo é bem dificil no inicio mas quando tu começas a jogar bastante tu ficas viciado no jogo, jogo incrivel

Ранговая система очень странная, а первые 100-200 часов ваш пукан будет полыхать от несправедливости подбора игроков в катку. За маньяка в принципе долгий подбор игроков и всё ради того, чтобы тебя "обоссала" тима токсиков, потому что баланс в игре тоже говно и маньяк зачастую не может переиграть всех 4-рых выживших. Игра хорошая, но на любителя, это не чилловая игра после трудного дня, это потная адская дрочильня с элементами хоррора. У меня всё. Игре 5 буббасов из 10.

Dead By Daylight is my personal favorite online multiplayer, however there are a couple of things that should be changed, for example MMR or Skill Based Matchmaking should NOT exist. MMR ruins the experience of playing as the killer and continues to prove the game is Survivor Sided. If Boon Totems can be rekindled, why can't Hex Totems? Survivor Rollback needs to be fixed to a server side over client side and many more. DbD is a fun and entertaining game with an amazing cast of survivors and killers but there are A LOT of imbalances that need to be fixed.

This game is honestly a blast, even frustrating at times.

But nevertheless, a great time killer.

"Dead By Daylight is a top-secret torture method that is developed by behaviour. this game is very bad and i don't recommend it to anyone. you have to be mentally handicapped to get any fun from this game thankfully spending about 30 minutes in dead by daylight makes u brain dead. you can visit very interesting locations like ormond or haddonfield and nothing else. this game will bring you very fun experiences and fond memories you can play as the survivors who need to repair generators to escape. playing survivors very easy considering this game is very balanced and the only thing you need to watch out for are random survivors that have the intellect of a plants vs zombies peashooter you can also play the killer who kills the survivors don't worry out of every killer only like three are viable on high ranks and you need to apply pressure to four people at the same time while you're playing paddle jaw trapper thankfully after four years this game still feels like it's an alpha. it's not dead by daylight if the map doesn't have shit hitboxes and is full with bugs. this game also consists of very fun cosmetics like a $15 trapper skin and pure cancer. overall this game is very bad. it's also like 100 dollars with every dlc 0 out of 10."
